SA10nagyuksu:7: nirvartyate yathā yuktayā bhāvo 'pi śrvavaṇaṃ kuru // Yukti_2
SA10nagyuksu:9: vimokṣastadabhāvena ko necchet kim na kārnāt // Yukti_3
SA10nagyuksu:10: vimokṣo nāsti bhāvena bhāvo nāsti hyabhāvataḥ /
SA10nagyuksu:12: nirvāṇam caiva lokaṃ ca manyante tattvadarśinaḥ /
SA10nagyuksu:13: naiva lokaṃ na nirvānaṃ manyante tattvadarśinaḥ // Yukti_5
SA10nagyuksu:14: nirvānaṃ ca bhavaścaiva dvayameva na vidyate /
SA10nagyuksu:18: samskṛto na parijñāto nirodho vibhave sati /
SA10nagyuksu:19: pratyakṣam bhūyate kasmin vibhavo jñāyate katham // Yukti_8
SA10nagyuksu:21: yadā cāyaṃ niruddhaḥ syāttadā mokṣo bhavisyati // Yukti_9
SA10nagyuksu:24: evam paśyati dharmaḥ yo nirvānam vā katam tathā /
SA10nagyuksu:25: dharmajñānam paraṃ yatra bhedastu tatra vidyate // Yukti_11
SA10nagyuksu:29: kutaḥ sampannabuddhaiśca tasyārambho na bhāṣitaḥ // Yukti_13
SA10nagyuksu:31: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādastasya purvaṃ paraṃ vā kim // Yukti_14
SA10nagyuksu:34: bhavatīdam yadā māyā namkṣyatīti tadaiva hi /
SA10nagyuksu:36: yathā marīcikā māyā bhavam buddhayā hi paśyati /
SA10nagyuksu:37: purvāntam vāparāntam vā na dṛṣṭayā parikliśyate // Yukti_17
SA10nagyuksu:39: pratītyotpādacakreṇa vijānanti na te jagat // Yukti_18
SA10nagyuksu:41: svayam yadā yadutpannamutpannam nāma tat katham // Yukti_19
SA10nagyuksu:43: svabhāvena hi yatkṣīṇam tat kṣīṇamucyate katham // Yukti_20
SA10nagyuksu:44: na kaścidanutpannam nirodho 'pi na vai tathā /
SA10nagyuksu:59: satyanmṛṣetyuktamāryena tatra kā śiṣyate parā // Yukti_28
SA10nagyuksu:71: tajjñānena viyukttena mṛṣaiva na vikalpitam // Yukti_34
SA10nagyuksu:73: nāva śiṣṭam tadā satyamevam vijñena kalpitam // Yukti_35
SA10nagyuksu:75: evambhūto bhavedyatra nā doṣo jāyate kathaṃ // Yukti_36
SA10nagyuksu:79: ajñānato hi samkalpa iti kim na vidhīyate // Yukti_38
SA10nagyuksu:80: hetutaḥ sambhavo yasya sthiti rna pratyayairvinā /
SA10nagyuksu:83: tadaiva hi sthitā mārge na kaściditasmayastataḥ // Yukti_40
SA10nagyuksu:85: kena vādena gṛhyante bhāvāḥ santi parā iti // Yukti_41
SA10nagyuksu:87: idam satyamado veti paṇḍitaiḥ kathamucyatai // Yukti_42
SA10nagyuksu:91: tatra liṅgādayo doṣāḥ prajāyante na vā kathaṃ // Yukti_44
SA10nagyuksu:92: yān hi dharmānupādāya dṛṣṭaścandro jale yathā /
SA10nagyuksu:93: tatra satyam mṛṣā naiva kāmaṃ dṛṣṭyā na hāritaḥ // Yukti_45
SA10nagyuksu:96: sa hetuḥ sarvadṛṣṭīnām kleśotpatti rna tam vinā /
SA10nagyuksu:102: mahātmanām na pakṣo vā vitarko vā na vidyate /
SA10nagyuksu:103: yeṣām na vidyate pakṣeḥ parapakṣaḥ kutasteṣām // Yukti_50
SA10nagyuksu:105: calaṃ vāniṣṭhitam cittaṃ na tiṣṭhatyanāśritam // Yukti_51
SA10nagyuksu:106: sāśraya cittavāna sattveḥ kleśodbhūto viṣo mahān /
SA10nagyuksu:107: sadā pṛthagajano hīnaḥ kleśasarpena gṛhītaḥ // Yukti_52
SA10nagyuksu:108: prativimbe yathā rāgo loke ca mohavandhanāt /
SA10nagyuksu:109: viṣayapinjaro sakto bālo hi satyasamjñayā // Yukti_53
SA10nagyuksu:113: rūpasvabhāvavijño yo vimukto buddhimān paraḥ // Yukti_55
SA10nagyuksu:119: arāge rāgavardhāste na sāśrayā mahātmanaḥ // Yukti_58
SA10nagyuksu:122: śāstreṇānena janānām punyam jñānam ca sancitam /
